value.original: Table (header) definition - Note that the name of most tables is automatically syncronized.
Defines the columns of a table. Note thet the name of the column is automatically syncronized.

row.value: 選擇或者變更元素後將自動更新名稱、描述、幫助及其他屬性。

value.original: The Reference Tab defines the references that are used to validate data
The Table Validation Tab defines tables to validate data
The List Validation Tab defines lists to validate data
The Window Tab defines each window in the system. The default flag indicates that this window should be used as the default Zoom windows for the tables in this window.
Tab definition within a window holds fields
The Tab Tab defines each Tab within a Window. Each Tab contains a discrete selection of fields. Note that the display and read only logic is evaluated when loading the window.

row.value: 分頁包含指定的欄位，註意窗口加載時分頁的只讀和顯示邏輯。

value.original: Field definitions in tabs in windows

row.value: 窗口中分頁的欄位定義

value.original: The Field Tab defines the Fields displayed within a tab. Changes made to the Field Tab become visible after restart due to caching. If the Sequence is negative, the record are ordered descending. Note that the name, description and help is automatically synchronized if centrally maintained.

row.value: 更改欄位的列，系統自動更新新列的名稱、描述、幫助、長度。同步詞條後，更新列的翻譯。

value.original: The Validation Rules Tab defines all dynamic rules used when entering and maintaining columns and fields.
The Message Tab displays error message text and menu messages

The Menu Tab defines the tree structured menu which will be used for the selected Organization. Note that the name and description will be automatically synchronized (overwritten), if not a summary node.
Menu Translation - May not need to be translated

row.value: 選單翻譯 - 可能不需要翻譯

value.original: Menu translations are derived from Window, Process, etc. You only need to translate Summary level items all others will be translated automatically (overwritten)
If you want to add an additional User Interface language, select "System Language". Otherwise, the system allows you to just translate elements for printing documents.
Menu Translation - May not need to be translated

row.value: 選單翻譯 - 可能不需要翻譯

value.original: Fields are automatically translated, if centrally maintained. You only need to translate not centrally maintained Fields.
Maintain User or Business Partner Contact

row.value: 維護用戶或業務夥伴聯絡人

value.original: The User Tab defines the log in for Users who have access to the system. For application access, users need to have a role assigned.

Define the role and add the tenant and organizations the role has access to. You can give users access to this role and modify the access of this role to windows, forms, processes and reports as well as tasks.
If the Role User Level is Manual, the assigned acces rights are not automatically updated (e.g. if a role has a restricted number of Windows/Processes it can access). You need to add organizational access unless the role has access to all organizations. The SuperUser and the user creating a new role are assigned to the role automatically.
If you select an Organization Tree, the user has access to the leaves of summary organizations. Note: You cannot change the System Administrator role.
The User Assignment Tab displays Users who have been defined for this Role.
The User Roles Tab define the Roles each user may have. The Roles will determine what windows, tasks, processes and workflows that a User has access to.

The Node Tab defines each Node, Activity or step in this Workflow.
The action (activity) type determines the execution: "Route" may be used in routing control conditions. "None" identifies manual execution.
The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.

The Conversion Rate Tab defines the rates to use when converting a source currency to an accounting or reporting currency. Note that only the multiply rate is used; The divide rate is for visualization only.
The Calendar Tab defines each calendar that will be used by an Organization.
The Year Window is used to define each year for the specified calendar.
The Period Tab defines a Period No, Name and Start Date for each Calendar Year. Each period begins on the defined Start Date and ends one day prior to the next period's Start Date.

The Non Business Days Tab defines those days to exclude when calculating the due date for given payment terms. For example, if an invoice terms was Net 10 days and the Invoice Date was 2/17/2000 the due date would be 2/27/2000. If 2/27/2000 was defined as a non business day then the due date on the Invoice would be 2/28/2000.

The Element Value Tab defines the individual valid values for the Element. The values must conform to the format defined. If the Element is an Account Type then the Account Classification (Asset, Liability etc) and posting controls are also defined
The Unit of Measure Tab defines a non monetary Unit of Measure.
Define standard Unit of Measure Conversion

row.value: 定義標準計量單位換算

value.original: The Conversion Tab defines the rates for converting a Unit of Measure. The system provides some automatic conversions between units of measures (e.g. minute, hour, day, working day, etc.) if they are not explicitly defined here. Conversions need to be direct (i.e. if you have only a conversion between A-B and B-C, the system cannot convert A-C, you need to define it explicitly).
Please create a support request - https://idempiere.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa - if the country data is not correct.

row.value: 如果國家有誤，請提交修改請求(https://idempiere.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa)

value.original: The Country Tab defines any country in which you do business. Values entered here are referenced in location records for Business Partners.
Please create a support request - https://idempiere.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa - if the region info is not correct/incomplete.

row.value: 如果區域資訊有誤，請提交修改請求(https://idempiere.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa)

value.original: The Region Tab defines a Region within a Country. This tab is enabled only if the Has Region checkbox is selected for the Country.
All not manually maintained Roles will automatically have access to the new Organization. You need execute Cache Reset and re-login for most changes made here to be effective.

row.value: 註意，沒有勾選“手動”標記的角色（自動權限）將能訪問新建的組織。

value.original: The Organization Tab is used to define an Organization. Each Organization has a Key and Name and optionally a Description. When adding a new organization, you must re-login to be able to access the new organization.

Create a new tenant via "Initial Tenant Setup". You can only change information here! You need execute Cache Reset and re-login for most changes made here to be effective. The change of the Material Policy applies to future transactions.

row.value: 重置緩存或重新登錄才能使更改起效。註：更改“收發策略”只影響未來事務。

value.original: The Tenant Definition Tab defines a unique tenant. Do not create a new tenant in this window, but use "Initial Tenant Setup" (System Administrator Role) to set up the required security and access rules. If you create a new tenant here, you will not be able to view it and also the required tenant infrastructure would not have been set up.

row.value: 系統或者單據的流水號定義

value.original: The Sequence Tab defines the numeric sequencing to use for documents. These can also include a alpha suffix and / or prefix.
The Workflow Tab defines Workflows in the system.
The Task Tab defines the unique tasks that will be used.
The Currency Tab defines any currency you will transact with or report in.

row.value: 會計科目、成本中心等賬戶維度元素

value.original: The Element Tab defines the Name, Description and Format for an Element. Additionally, a Type of Account or User Defined is selected. Each Account Schema must have an Account Element type. The User Defined Elements are optional.

row.value:
用於具體的記賬方式會計元素，比如會計科目、成本中心等。科目（自然賬戶）是最常見的會計維度元素。你可以使用多個會計元素來生成並行報表或者自定義賬戶維度。
【註意】自定義元素的樹，必須是“用戶1”或者“用戶2”，且包含全部樹節點，否則無法保存。
維護地點的地址資訊，僅供系統管理員使用

value.original: The Location Tab defines the location of an Organization.
Maintain System Tenant Org and User Preferences

row.value: 維護系統實體組織與用戶的偏愛值

value.original: The Project Tab is used to define the Value, Name and Description for each project. It also is defines the tracks the amounts assigned to, committed to and used for this project. Note that when the project Type is changed, the Phases and Tasks are re-created.

row.value:
項目類型分為：
通用/服務項目：無法投放資產
工單/資產項目：可投放資產並產生會計分錄

不同類型的項目可以按需要設置不同明細明細類型：
項目明細：無法產生銷售訂單
項目階段 -- 階段明細：可按階段生成銷售訂單
項目階段 -- 任務 -- 任務明細：可按階段生成銷售訂單

可以對項目明細采用“採購/生產/調撥”方式來投放資產。
可以對階段可以生成銷售訂單，並對訂單開票。
項目表頭自動匯總項目/階段明細的數量和金額，以進行預算管理。

value.original: The GL Category Tab defines optional identifiers for a document or journal. Each Category may be used on a document, manual journal or import

The GL Journal Batch Tab defines the control parameters for a Journal Batch. A Batch can consist of multiple Journals. If the Control Amount is not zero, it is compared to the Total Debit Amount. The Control/Debit/Credit Amount is in Source Document Currency.

The GL Journal Tab defines the control parameters for a single GL Journal. If the Control Amount is not zero, it is compared to the Total Debit Amount. The Control/Debit/Credit Amount is in Source Document Currency.
The GL Journal Line Tab defines the individual debit and credit transactions that comprise a journal.
The Document Definition Tab defines the processing parameters and controls for the document. Note that shipments for automatic documents like POS/Warehouse Orders cannot have confirmations!

row.value: 基礎單據類型可能存在多個子單據，可指定某個子單據為預設選項。

value.original: You need to execute Cache Reset and re-login for most changes made here to be effective.

row.value: 重置緩存或重新登錄才能使更改起效。

value.original: The Tenant Info Tab defines the details for each tenant. The accounting rules and high level defaults are defined here. The Calendar is used to determine if a period is open or closed.
You need execute Cache Reset and re-login for most changes made here to be effective.

row.value: 重置緩存或重新登錄才能使更改起效。

value.original: The Organization Info Tab is used to define an Organization's address, DUNS number and Tax Identification number

row.value: 定義組織的地址、稅號等資訊

value.original: The Attachment tab displays the attributes of an attachment.

row.value: 維護稅目和稅率的定義

value.original:
The Tax Rate Window defines the different taxes used for each tax category. For example Sales Tax must be defined for each State in which it applies.
If you have multiple taxes create a summary level tax with the approximate total tax rate and the actual tax rates pointing to the summary level tax as their parent. When entering the order or invoice lines the tax is estimated the correct tax is calculated when the document is processed. The tax is always calculated from the line net amount. If one tax has a the tax basis the line net amount and another tax you need to adjust the percentage to result in the correct amount.
Valid From/To is determined by the parent tax.
The Tax Category Tab is used to define and maintain Tax Categories. Each Product is associated with a Tax Category. This facilitates adapting to changes in taxation.

row.value: 產品的存儲位置或者服務提供點

value.original: The Warehouse Tab defines each Warehouse that is used to store products. If a Source warehouse is selected, all product replenishment is from that warehouse. If you use custom replenishment algorithms, you need to define the class used per warehouse.

row.value:
與實際物理倉庫不同，系統的倉庫概念與財務的存貨核算範圍緊密聯系。組織為可以獨立核算的單位，其下的倉庫也都由組織財務核算。你可以按照物理倉庫來劃分不同的倉庫，也可以使用一個倉庫來管理所有存貨和服務。
倉庫具有“在途”“禁止負庫存”選項，庫位類型具有“可預留”“可發貨”“可補貨”選項。
【註意】所有倉庫都會進行成本計算，沒有0成本倉庫。也就是說材料是否核算成本，不是從倉庫角度去定義，而是從材料本身去定義，比如虛擬件。

value.original: The Locator Tab defines any Locators for that Warehouse.

row.value: 包含不同日期的在手數量、預留數量、在途數量。

value.original: The Product Tab defines each product and identifies it for use in price lists and orders. The Location is the default location when receiving the stored product.
The Substitute Tab defines products which may be used as a replacement for the selected product.

The Replenishment Tab defines the type of replenishment quantities. This is used for automated ordering. If you select a custom replenishment type, you need to create a class implementing org.compiere.util.ReplenishInterface and set that on warehouse level.

row.value:
設置補貨策略後，可以在庫存模塊的“補貨報表”開始手動補貨。
不選擇補貨單據，就是查看報表。如果選擇補貨單據，系統將補貨結果生成補貨單據明細。

value.original: The Pricing Tab displays the List, Standard and Limit prices for each price list a product is contained in.

row.value: The Pricing Tab displays the List, Standard and Limit prices for each price list a product is contained in.

value.original: The Payment Term Tab defines the different payments terms that you offer to your Business Partners when paying invoices and also those terms which your Vendors offer you for payment of your invoices. On the standard invoice, the Name and the Document Note of the Payment Term is printed.

row.value: 定義供應商和客戶的支付條件和折扣規則。同時，“標準發票”單據的支付條款名稱和單據附註將會被打印。

value.original: The Shippers Tab defines any entity who will provide shipping to or shipping from an Organization.
The Order Header Tab defines the parameters of an Order. Changing the Organization, Business Partner, Warehouse, Date Promised, etc. changes these values on all the lines.

row.value:
銷售訂單有9種子單據類型：

報價方案：完成後，不預留庫存
報價單：完成後，預留庫存
標準訂單：完成後，無自動單據生成
倉庫訂單：完成後，自動生成發貨單
賒銷訂單：完成後，自動生成發貨單、發票
預付訂單：完成後無動作，付款後自動生成發貨單、發票
POS訂單：完成後，自動生成發貨單、發票、收款單
退貨授權：分客戶RMA和供應商RMA

更多說明參考：http://idempiere_guide_fi.mydoc.io/?t=178385

value.original: The Order Line Tab defines the individual line items that comprise an Order.
The Product Category defines unique groupings of products. Product categories can be used in building price lists.
Price lists determine currency of the document as well as tax treatment.

row.value:
價格的計算順序：
1. 價格表夥伴價格，不再計算折扣
2. 價格表產品價格，如果沒有折扣
3. 價格表產品價格，按 折扣規則計算

value.original: The Price List Tab displays the prices for a product based on the selected price list.
The Invoice Schedule Tab defines the frequency for which batch invoices will be generated for a Business Partner.

row.value:
定義業務發票的開票頻度和規則。
【註意1】系統預設使用銷售訂單的訂購日期作為日期計劃，且未對訂單行的發貨數量進行判定，業務習慣按照發貨單日期進行開票，需實施修改c_invoice_candidate_v視圖。
【註意2】通常國內按稅務發票日期結算，而稅務發票可能與系統應付/應收發票日期存在差異。

value.original: The Conversion Rates tab is used to define conversion rates to be used when converting document amounts from one currency to another. Conversion rates can be defined for multiple rate types. They can also be effective for a defined range of dates. Note that only the multiply rate is used; The divide rate is for visualization only.
If you change the currency or costing method, you must reset all accounting transactions. For changes to become effective, you must execute Cache Reset.

row.value: 如果更改“貨幣”或“成本計價方法”，則必須重新過賬所有會計事務。重啟應用服務器或者會計處理器，會計賬套的更改才會生效。

value.original: The Accounting Schema Tab defines the controls used for accounting. You can define multiple accounting schema per tenant (for parallel accounting). Postings are generated for an accounting schema, if the schema is valid and you have defined GL and Default accounts and after completion of the Add / Copy Accounts process.

row.value: 會計賬套通常由“會計準則”，“日歷”，“貨幣”，“科目表”組成。系統支持多個賬套自動記賬。

value.original: For changes to become effective, you must execute Cache Reset and re-login.

row.value: 重置緩存或重新登錄才能使更改起效。

value.original: The General Ledger Tab defines error and balance handling to use as well as the necessary accounts for posting to General Ledger.
The Marketing Campaign Tab defines the parameters for a Campaign. These include a start and end date as well as the amount of any invoices that have been processed which reference this campaign.
The Marketing Channel Tab defines the different methods or processes through which customers are obtained.

row.value: 維護系統級的字典元素

value.original: The Element Tab defines each system level element.

row.value: 數據庫列必須映射為一個系統元素，從而使得元素可以集中維護界面欄位的詞條（名稱，描述，備註）。

value.original: The Period Control Tab displays the status of a Period (Never Opened, Opened, Closed).
The Sales Region Tab defines the different regions where you do business. Sales Regions can be used when generating reports or calculating commissions.
The Account Combination Tab defines and displays valid account combination. An Alias can be defined to facilitate document entry.

row.value:
賬戶組合是各個維度的不同組合而形成的不同賬戶。賬號新建後，系統會自動創建賬套的預設科目的賬戶組合，以供設置缺省賬戶。
當用戶在手工憑證中使用具體賬戶時，可以在彈出的“賬戶組合”的小窗口中新增和修改組合記錄，並可維護組合別名。
如果賬套打開“使用賬戶別名”選項，你可以直接輸入賬戶別名來帶入所有賬戶維度資訊，當然賬戶組合要定義了別名。

value.original: The GL Budget Tab defines a General Ledger Budget
The GL Budgets are used to define the anticipated costs of doing business. They are used in reporting as a comparison to actual amounts.
The Accounting Tab defines the Accounting parameters to be used for inventory in that Warehouse.
The Accounting Tab defines the defaults to use when generating accounting transactions for orders and invoices which contain this product.
The Accounting Tab is used to define the Asset Account to use when a project is completed and the associated asset realized.
The Customer Accounting Tab defines the default accounts to use when this business partner is referenced on an accounts receivable transaction.
The Vendor Accounting Tab defines the default accounts to use when this business partner is referenced in an accounts payable transaction.
The Cities Tab defines Cities within a Country or Region. Cities entered here are not referenced when entering the address.

ATTENTION: ANY CHANGES here will affect the structure of your chart of accounts! Depending what changes you did, you should reset accounting. For changes to become effective, you must and execute Cache Reset and re-login. Saving/deleting the record starts processes which may take a while.

row.value: 註意：此處任何更改將影響會計賬戶結構， 請檢查並重設賬套參數。 重置緩存或重新登錄才能使更改起效。

value.original: Define the dimensions of your Account Key

The Account Schema Dimensions Tab defines the dimensions that comprise the account key. A name is defined which will display in documents. Also the order of the dimensions and if they are balanced and mandatory are indicated.
The Business Partner Tab defines any Entity with whom an organization transacts.

row.value: 維護業務夥伴地點的地址

value.original: The Location Tab defines the physical location of a business partner. A business partner may have multiple location records.
The Define Bank Account Tab defines the banking information for this business partner. This data is used for processing payments and remittances.

row.value: 設置組織或者合作夥伴的銀行和帳戶

value.original: The Bank Tab defines a bank that is used by an organization or business partner. Each Bank is given an identifying Name, Address, Routing No and Swift Code
The Account Tab is used to define one or more accounts for a Bank. Each account has a unique Account No and Currency. The bank account organization is used for accounting.

row.value: 定義業務夥伴的預扣資訊

value.original: The Withholding Tab defines any withholding information for this business partner.
The Translation Tab defines a Document Type in an alternate language.
The Dunning Tab defines the parameters for a dunning level.

row.value: 催款規則包含多個催款級別，每個催款級別可生成一份催款通知。如果催款規則設置“發送催款通知”，且客戶主數據已指定“催款規則”，系統將自動發送催款通知。

value.original: The Translation Tab defines the translation to an alternate language
The Order Tax Tab displays the tax amount for an Order based on the lines entered.
The Charge Tab defines the unique charges that may be associated with a document. The optional Business Partner allows to create Purchase Orders from Requisitions.

Price lists are automatically created based on Product Purchasing Information and the Vendor Category Discount. The other alternative is to copy them from existing pricelists and the re-calculate them. You can also re-calculate the pricelist by referencing no pricelist or referencing the same pricelist. If no base price list is selected, the Procuct Purchase records are used as reference.
The Purchasing Tab define the pricing and rules ( pack quantity, UPC, minimum order quantity) for each product.
The Withholding Rules Tab define the rules governing the withholding of amounts.

row.value: 查看不同過賬模式下的所有會計分錄。

value.original: The Tree Tab defines a Tree which will be displayed.

The Report and Process Tab defines each report and process run in the system. Please note that the Print Format is only used for Document Print when you want to share a common format defined on System level. For normal reports and formats, you would not define a Print Format here, but modify the generated print format and set it as the default.

row.value: 定義系統中的報表或者流程。如果在系統級共享打印格式給所有實體，先定義打印格式，再在打印格式內定義視圖。對於通用的報表和打印格式，無需定義打印格式，只需定義視圖，系統將按照視圖自動生成實體的打印格式，供用戶自行修改並設置為缺省。

value.original: The Report Parameter Tab defines any parameters required to execute a report or process.

row.value: 定義執行報表或者流程的參數。
基於作業成本法的作業定義(ABC)
定義業務模塊的缺省賬戶

value.original: The Defaults Tab displays the Default accounts for an Accounting Schema. These values will display when a new document is opened. The user can override these defaults within the document.

The Inventory Count Tab defines the parameters for a manual count and adjustment of inventory. When creating the inventory count list automatically, only the actual stored products are included. The exception is when you select the equals 0 (=0) option, then zero on hand records of all stocked products is created for that location.

row.value:
使用盤點參數生成（賬面）盤點清單，供實地盤點後輸入真實庫存。
【註意1】一次盤點一個倉庫。
【註意2】如果某個產品的庫位包含多個屬性，生成盤點明細，其產品屬性為空，多個屬性的在手數量在子分頁“產品屬性”記錄。如果產品的庫位只包含一條屬性，生成盤點明細，其產品屬性為該屬性。
【BUG】如果產品以前存在空屬性，則自動生成的產品屬性不包含空屬性（BUG，盤點明細和產品屬性數量不等）

value.original: The Inventory Count Line defines the counts of the individual products in inventory. Normally you would create inventory count lines automaticelly. If you create them manually, make sure that the book value is correct. You can set the Organization, if it is a charge, otherwise it is set to the header organization.
The Shipments Tab allows you to generate, maintain, enter and process Shipments to a Customer or Returns from a Customer.
The Shipment Line Tab defines the individual items in a Shipment.
The Move Tab defines and identifies the movement of an item or items in inventory.

row.value: 調撥單允許你從源庫位移動存貨到目標庫位。如果沒有調撥確認，點擊“單據處理”後會更新庫存。

value.original: The Move Line Tab defines the product and quantity to be moved and the location it is moving from and to.
The Invoice Tab defines the parameters of an Invoice generated for a Business Partner. It constitutes an accounts receivable.
The Dunning Level Tab defines the timing and frequency of the dunning notices.

row.value: 指定到期參數和催款備註，每個催款級別可生成一條催款通知。

value.original: The Invoice Line Tab defines the individual items or charges on an Invoice.
The Invoice Tax Tab displays the total tax due based on the Invoice Lines.
The Revenue Recognition Tab defines the intervals at which revenue will be recognized. You can also base the revenue recognition on provided Service Levels.

Enter payment or receipt for a Business Partner. If it is for a single invoice it can be allocated directly to that invoice using this screen. You can also apply over/under payments:
You have an over-payment, if you received more money than due for a single invoice. Instead of writing the difference off (i.e. would be a gain), you can leave the amount unallocated and use it for later invoices or credit memos. Please note that the Amount is the payment amount, so you need to enter the over-payment as a negative amount.
You can also receive a partial payment (under-payment). If you decide not to write off the remaining invoice amount, enter the under-payment as a positive amount.
Note that printed payments are archived in Payment Selection (Prepared Payment).

value.original:
Define the selection criteria for paying the commission. If you do not enter restricting parameters (e.g. for specific Business Partner (Groups) or Product (Categories), etc. all transactions for the period will be used to calculate the commission.
After converting from the transaction to the commission currency, the formula for calculating the commission is:
(Converted Amount - Subtract Amount) * Amount Multiplier + (Actual Quantity - Subtract Quantity) * Quantity Multiplier
You can choose, that only positive amounts (Converted Amount - Subtract Amount) and positive quantities (Actual Quantity - Subtract Quantity) are used in the calculation.

row.value: 定義折扣的規則，【註意】規則無法通過“有效”選項控制失效。

value.original:
Pricelists are created based on Product Purchase and Category Discounts. The parameters listed here allow to copy and calculate pricelists.
The calculation:
  • Copy and convert price from referenced price list
  • result plus Surcharge Amount
  • result minus Discount
  • if resulting price is less than the original limit price plus min Margin, use this price (only if Margin is not zero)
  • if resulting price is more than the original limit price plus max Margin, use this price (only if Margin us not zero)
  • Round resulting price
The Formula is
NewPrice = (Convert(BasePrice) + Surcharge) * (100-Discount) / 100;
if MinMargin <> 0 then NewPrice = Max (NewPrice, Convert(OrigLimitPrice) + MinMargin);
if MaxMargin <> 0 then NewPrice = Min (NewPrice, Convert(OrigLimitPrice) + MaxMargin);

Example: (assuming same currency)
Original Prices: List=300, Standard=250, Limit=200;
New List Price: Base=List, Surcharge=0, Discount=0, Round

row.value:
價格表按照規則行的定義進行創建。步驟如下：
1. 從參考價格表拷貝產品價格，並轉換。
2. 轉換結果，加上附加價格。
3. 然後減去折扣。
4. 【未實施】如果結果小於（限制價+最低毛利），則取2者最大值。
5. 【未實施】如果結果大於（限制價+最高毛利），則取2者最小值。

公式：
新價格 = （基礎價格 + 附加價格）* （100-折扣率）/100
如果最低毛利 <> 0 ，則 新價格 = 最大值（新價格，原限制價格+最低毛利）
如果最高毛利 <> 0 ，則 新價格 = 最小值（新價格，原限制價格+最高毛利）
基於數量/金額分段的階梯折扣，系統匹配第一個滿足規則
比如：數量分段值10， 折扣5%，表示數量 >= 10，折扣為5%。 【註意】可設置“有效”選項取消分段。 【Tips】分段值從大到小設置順序，否則永遠是小值滿足匹配成功。

The print format determines how data is rendered for print.

Item in the print format maintaining layout information. The following additional variables are available when printing:

@*Page@ - the current page number
@*PageCount@ - the total number of pages
@*MultiPageInfo@ - "Page x of y" - only printed if more than one page
@*CopyInfo@ - if it is a copy of the document "Duplicate" is printed
@*ReportName@ - name of the report
@*Header@ - Full Header with user/tenant/org name and connection
@*CurrentDate@ - the print date
@*CurrentDateTime@ - the print time

The layoit logic for forms is:
- if not printed: ignore
- set New Line Position
- new page
- new line, if something was printed since last new line
- format item
- print it (if not null/empty selected)
(i.e. supress null does not prevent new line)

Before importing, iDempiere checks the Unit of Measure (default if not set), the Product Category (default if not set), the Business Partner, the Currency (defaults to accounting currency if not set), the Product Type (only Items and Services), the uniqueness of UPC, Key and uniqueness and existence of the Vendor Product No.
iDempiere tries to map to existing products, if the UPC, the Key and the Vendor Product No matches (in this sequence). If the imported record could be matched, product field values will only be overwritten, if the corresponding Import field is explicitly defined. Example: the Product Category will only be overwritten if explicitly set in the Import.

If listed here, the Role can(not) access all data of this table, even if the role has access to the functionality.
If you Include Access to a table and select Read Only, you can only read data (otherwise full access).
If you Exclude Access to a table and select Read Only, you can only read data (otherwise no access).
Please note that table access rules here are in addition to the Data Access Levels defined for a Table and the User Level defined for a Role. These rules are evaulated first and you only need to define the exceptions to these rules here.

Note that access information is cached and requires re-login or reset of cache. Be aware that if you use Include rules, that you need to include also several supporting entiries. As an alternative, grant access only to functionality required.

You create Record Access records by enabling "Personal Lock" for the administrative role and Ctl-Lock (holding the Ctrl key while clicking on the Lock button).

A new Journal Batch is created, if the Batch Document No or accounting schema are different. A new Journal is created, if the Document No, Currency, Document Type, GL Category, Posting Type or Accounting type is different. You can also force the creation of a new Batch or Jornal by selecting the creat new flag.

Please note that there are three Organization Fields: The Document Organization is the owner of the document and set directly or per parameter default. The Organization is part of the accounting key and only required id no Valid Account Comination is specified; If not defined it is derived from the Document Organization. The Transaction Organization is part of the account combination.
The optional balance check applies to the entire import, not for individual batches or journals.
The document numbers will be overwritten if the document type is not set to manual sequences.

If the account combination criteria of the Distribution is met, the posting to the account combination is replaced by the account combinations of the distribution lines. The distribution is prorated based on the percentage of the lines. If the total percent is less then 100 and one line is 0 (null), it gets the remainder. If there is no line with 0, any rounding is adjusted in the line with the biggest amount.

如果分配行比例合計不等於100%，該規則將無法作用。

value.original: When using explicit documents for inter-org transaction (after linking a Business Partner to an Organization), you can determine what document type the counter document is based on the document type of the original transaction. Example: a "Standard Order" creates a "Standard PO". If you define a relationship here, you overwrite the default counter document type in the Document Type definition. This allows you to define a specific mapping. You can define conter documents for all organizations (of the original transaction) or for a specific organization.

row.value:
組織間事務可以通過反向關系自動生成（顯式的）的業務單據。系統缺省的反向單據在“單據類型”定義是否開啟，如果自定義的單據類型需要啟用指定的反向單據，此處可定義映射並可覆蓋缺省反向關系。
5組基礎單據類型自帶的反向關系：
採購訂單 <--> 銷售訂單
收貨單 <--> 發貨單
採購發票 <--> 銷售發票
採購貸項 <--> 銷售貸項
付款單 <--> 收款單
參考：http://wiki.compiere.com/display/docs/The+Multi%27s

允許輸入多個業務夥伴的發票明細，僅能選擇雜費，通常用於供應商AP發票場景，因為銷售業務都必須輸入產品，沒有直接做費用應收的（應該是服務應收發票）。
當從批表頭“創建發票”時，系統先檢查總額必須等於控制金額，然後按不同業務夥伴、發票地點、單據類型分別生成相應發票。

value.original: A new invoice is created, if there is a different Document Number, Business Partner or Location (address). Note that the Document Number may be overwritten - depending on the Number control of the selected Document Type.

row.value:
如果明細的單號、業務夥伴或者地點不同，系統將生成不同的發票。
【註意】
1. 批明細的單號，將被用於發票單號，初始與發票批單號一致。
2. 更改批明細的單據類型，單號自動遞增，但僅限於數字類編號。
3. 如果發票批序號定義為帶字符前/後綴，批明細單號無法自動遞增，維持原號，需要手工編輯。
4. 同一供應商，且單據類型相同，新增批明細，單號保持不變。
5. 不同供應商，新增批明細，單號自動按“發票批單號”遞增。
6. 不同發票批的明細單號會重號，導致生成發票也會重號，創建失敗。
7. 原因，06發票批的3個明細可能是06，07，08，而07發票批的明細可能是07，08，明細重號表示發票重號。
【解決】 1. 批明細取單據類型的序號，而不是發票批單號。 2. 只要 BP ，單據類型，地點發生變化，批明細單號都要按單據類型進行更新。

value.original: Lets you define different tax combinations.
You can use the tax definition information to create the logic necessary to get the tax rate to your document.
The Accounting Tab defines the accounting parameters to be used for transactions referencing this Tax Rate.

The Tax Rate Window defines the different taxes used for each tax category. For example Sales Tax must be defined for each State in which it applies.
If you have multiple taxes create a summary level tax with the approximate total tax rate and the actual tax rates pointing to the summary level tax as their parent. When entering the order or invoice lines the tax is estimated the correct tax is calculated when the document is processed. The tax is always calculated from the line net amount. If one tax has a the tax basis the line net amount and another tax you need to adjust the percentage to result in the correct amount.
Valid From/To is determined by the parent tax.

如果產品無業務夥伴定義，所有夥伴的共用該價格。 如果無產品價格定義，系統從“產品價格”中取值，再參與折扣規則計算。
比如：時間、資格、促銷碼、促銷次數等。
如果買X送Y （且X、Y不在一個促銷組），就需要2條促銷明細

value.original:
The Bill of Materials tab defines those products that are generated from other products. A Bill of Material (BOM) is one or more Products or BOMs.
Available Quantity: - Stored BOMs have to be created via "Production" - The available quantity of a non-stored BOMs is dynamically calculated - The attribute "Stored" is defined in the "Product" tab
Price: - BOMs must be listed in Pricelists - If the price is 0.00, the price is dynamically calculated
Printing: - Usually, only the BOM information is printed - For invoices, delivery slips and pick lists, you have the option to print the details - In the details, the quantity is listed - and the price, if this is dynamically calculated

row.value: 匯總支付單，準備批量存款（支票和現金）

選擇支付類型、銀行賬戶，將已處理的支付單歸集到批量存款，以方便銀行結算和對賬，具體流程為：現場支付--做支付單--批量匯款--銀行處理。銀行對賬可以引用“批量存款”記錄而匯入所有支付單。
實際業務中，收到多筆支票或者信用卡憑證後，集中去銀行存兌（批量存入）。或者小額支付的匯總都可以使用該功能。

視圖中AS SELECT語句的相關子句定義

視圖組件包含了數據庫視圖的SELECT語句的FROM , WHERE , GROUP BY 和 HAVING 子句。如果視圖包含了多SELECT語句（比如使用UNION），則每個SELECT語句都需要一個視圖組件。
As an example, if your database view is created with the following statement:

CREATE VIEW
someView ( someViewID, someViewName)
AS SELECT someID, someName FROM someTable WHERE someAttribute = 'Y'

Then the following information will be stored in the various tabs of the 'Table and Column' window:

The 'Table' Tab will store the view name someView and the fact that this Compiere table correspond to a database view.
The 'Column' Tab will store the names and datatype of the someViewID and someViewName view columns.
The 'View Component' Tab will store the FROM clause FROM someTable and the WHERE clause WHERE someAttribute = 'Y' of the view SELECT statement.
The 'View Column' Tab will store the columns someID, someName in the SELECT clause of the view SELECT statement.

AS SELECT 與 FROM 之間的列名。 As an example, if your database view is created with the following statement:

CREATE VIEW
someView ( someViewID, someViewName)
AS SELECT someID, someName FROM someTable WHERE someAttribute = 'Y'

Then the following information will be stored in the various tabs of the 'Table and Column' window:

The 'Table' Tab will store the view name someView and the fact that this Compiere table correspond to a database view.
The 'Column' Tab will store the names and datatype of the someViewID and someViewName view columns.
The 'View Component' Tab will store the FROM clause FROM someTable and the WHERE clause WHERE someAttribute = 'Y' of the view SELECT statement.
The 'View Column' Tab will store the columns someID, someName in the SELECT clause of the view SELECT statement.

row.value: 定義可用於打印格式項的分頁列

指定窗口和標簽，選單欄的“CSV模板匯入”按鈕起效。增加匯入權限後，可直接在窗口或使用流程選擇CSV表頭模板來匯入CSV文件。
表頭定義格式：
單表：列名1[顯示列1],列名2,.....
父子表：列名1/K[顯示列1],子表名>列名1/K,子表名>列名2/K,.....
1. 僅支持2級父子表，層級不能超過2級，比如不支持“國家>區域>城市”3級定義。
2. 父表無需表名，子表必須帶表名。
3. 父表必須指定一個列為主鍵，加“/K”，子表必須同時也使用這個列，表示外鍵。
4. 子表的主鍵列可以有多個。
5. 不能對已完成、已關閉的單據進行匯入操作。
